```{r import deliveries}

library(readr)
Deliveries <- read_csv("dataset/Deliveries.csv")

```

<br>

#Finding Sanju Samson Total runs in IPL

```{r}
library (tidyverse)
Sanju <- Deliveries %>% 
  filter(batsman == "SV Samson")
Indi_runs <- sum(Sanju$batsman_run)
Indi_match <- Sanju %>% 
  group_by(match_no)
Indi_match <- n_distinct(Indi_match$match_no)
Not_out <- Sanju %>% 
  group_by(match_no) %>% 
  filter(is_wicket == 1) 
Not_out <- Indi_match - n_distinct(Not_out$match_no)
Four <- Sanju %>% 
  filter(batsman_run == 4)
Four <- count(Four,)
Six <- Sanju %>% 
  filter(batsman_run == 6)
Six <- count(Six,)
Scores <- Sanju %>% 
  group_by(match_no) %>% 
  summarise(sum(batsman_run))
High_score <- max(Scores$`sum(batsman_run)`)
Low_score <- min(Scores$`sum(batsman_run)`)
```
